thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 11 of 178
thread.title: K Booth

author: K Booth
title: K Booth
text: Very easy-to-use website for both finding a sitter and offering to do house and pet sits. The review and feedback system is good in helping you make a choice. There is one "BUT" though; if someone lets you down as a sitter there is no way of leaving feedback that they have done so. As it stands at the moment you can only leave feedback for someone who has completed a house sit.
